briefdescription.para: Initialize the shell history system with custom I/O functions.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets up the internal history system and loads existing history using the provided read/write callbacks.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I/O structure used for read/write access.
Callback to read saved history data.
Callback to persist current history data.

briefdescription.para: Save a new command to the history buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the command string (without EOL).

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the previous command from history.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to store the command string.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the next command from history.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to store the command string.

briefdescription.para: Get the total number of commands stored in history.

detaileddescription.para: Starts from the most recently saved command and iterates backwards through the history buffer to count all stored commands.

simplesect.para: Number of stored commands in history.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve a command from history by its index.

detaileddescription.para: Index 0 corresponds to the most recently saved command, index 1 to the previous one, and so on.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to store the retrieved command.
Index of the command to retrieve (0 = latest).

simplesect.para: Length of the retrieved command, or 0 if not found or buffer too small.
